name: Fitz Packerton
description:
A theatrical game about a man and the things he carries.
Pack what you must. Pray you won't need it.

by Brendon Chung, Teddy Dief, Ryan Cousins, Sarah Elmaleh

Story & Design by... Brendon Chung, Teddy Dief
Code & Levels by... Brendon Chung
Art by... Teddy Dief, Ryan Cousins
Voice by... Sarah Elmaleh
Music by... Teddy Dief
